name: I Now Pronounce You Husband and Wife: Part Two Trivia Quiz | Television | 20 Questions

questions.text: A coin stopped a bullet from killing the groom during this couple's wedding ceremony.
questions.explanation:
Ben and Vicki.

	In the ABC drama, 'One Life to Live', Ben's mother, Renee, gave him a coin to keep with him during the wedding ceremony. It saved his life when he was shot during the ceremony held on November 13, 2000.

questions.text: On this couple's wedding day, the matron of honor was kidnapped in the church right before the ceremony began.
questions.explanation:
Jason and Courtney.

	On the ABC drama, 'General Hospital', Courtney's sister-in-law, Carly, was kidnapped from the bride's room by Carly's husband's half brother on June 13, 2003.

questions.text: This bride spoke for the first time at her wedding after an accident took her hearing and speech earlier that year.
questions.explanation:
Steve and Kayla.

	Steve's prayer to God on his wedding day on July 25, 1988: "I can't believe this. I can't believe this is going to happen. I guess I got you to thank, huh, Big Dude? She thinks she gave me a lot. Man, I didn't even have dreams. I thought my life was going to be all bad. I had no idea that I could have love and you gave me Kayla; now I have it all, I'm beginning to think I deserve it. Thanks, Dude. I'll be back. I'll be back!"

questions.text: An Angel married the woman of his dreams during an unconventional ceremony in their favorite spot: a barn.
questions.explanation:
Rafe and Alison.

	On this ABC drama, 'Port Charles', Rafe and Alison married each other in a barn on March 15, 2002 making this scene one of PC's most memorable moments.

questions.text: The bride gave birth to a son during this couple's wedding.
questions.explanation:
John and Isabella.

	On the NBC drama, 'Days of Our Lives', on Isabella and John's wedding day on May 19, 1992 Isabella went into labor as she was being walked down the aisle. Isabella was able to get through her vows before delivering a baby boy. After the birth, Isabella and baby were wheeled back into the church to finish the wedding ceremony.

questions.text: On this couple's wedding day, the bride got stuck on a boat with her ex-boyfriend while her twin sister acted like the bride until the real bride could arrive.
questions.explanation:
Jake and Vicky.

	On this NBC drama, 'Another World', Vicky and Jake were married on November 21, 1997 at the Botanical Gardens where Kirkland suggested they get married. Vicky arrived just in time to walk down the aisle. Marley entered the wedding shortly after leaving Jake wondering what had happened.

questions.text: The wedding for this couple started out with the bride being carried into the church dressed as Cleopatra.
questions.explanation:
Asa and Alex.

	On the ABC drama, 'One Life to Live', ex-FAB agent Alex Olanov dressed as Cleopatra married Asa Buchanan on March 29, 1996. Throughout her short marriage she had an affair.

questions.text: This couple's wedding has been described as the biggest event in soap opera history.
questions.explanation:
Luke and Laura.

	On this ABC drama, 'General Hospital', Luke and Laura were married on November 16, 1981 making their wedding the most watched event, just like Prince Charles and Lady Diana's wedding.

questions.text: A barnful of people, including their two day old daughter, were there to witness this couple's second wedding
questions.explanation:
Jack and Carly.

	On the CBS drama, 'As The World Turns', Jack and Carly were married for the second time on July 3, 2003. Craig, Rosanna, Mike, Katie, Molly, Parker and newborn Sage Snyder were all the guests at the wedding.

questions.text: This woman ended her wedding day when she found out her husband-to-be was in love with her daughter.
questions.explanation:
Brooke and Ridge.

	On the CBS drama, 'The Bold and the Beautiful', Brooke overheard Ridge talking about caring for Bridget as more than just a friend on May 12, 2003.

questions.text: A case of mistaken identity led to this woman's kidnapping on this couple's wedding day.
questions.explanation:
Cass and Frankie.

	On the NBC drama, 'Another World', Frankie was mistaken for her aunt, Charlene, and kidnapped on her wedding day by undercover police officer Ryan Harrison. She was thrown into the back of a waiter's van where she fell face first in her wedding cake. Ryan and Frankie remained best friends until his death in 1995.

questions.text: This princess bride married her one true love in a chapel on her family's estate.
questions.explanation:
Ryan and Gillian.

	On the ABC drama, 'All My Children', Princess Gillian married the man of her dreams on April 9, 2001. Their marriage was short lived because three months later Gillian was mistaken for someone else and murdered. Because she was an organ donor, Gillian's heart went to Laura Dupres.

questions.text: This couple married even though they were rival fashion designers.
questions.explanation:
Tony and Kristen.

	On the CBS drama, 'The Bold and The Beautiful', Kristin Forrester married Tony Dominguez on November 26, 2002. They were not only rival fashion designers, but Tony had just been diagnosed with HIV. On their honeymoon to Africa, Tony and Kristen met and adopted a young boy with HIV named Zende.

questions.text: Before this couple's wedding, the bride dropped ketchup on her wedding dress, ruined her hairstyle and learned the paternity of her youngest son.
questions.explanation:
Bo and Hope.

	On the NBC drama, 'Days of Our Lives', Hope and Bo were married on Christmas Eve of 2000 in front of family and friends after Hope's dress was cleaned of ketchup, her hair was redone and the results of Zac's paternity test came in.

questions.text: During this couple's wedding ceremony, the oldest sister decked the bride when the paternity of the bride's son was revealed to be the groom's brother and not the groom.
questions.explanation:
Austin and Sami.

	On the NBC drama, 'Days of Our Lives', Sami was close to be Mrs. Austin Reed when her sister Carrie found out that Will's father was actually Lucas and not Austin. Carrie knocked Sami out, Austin called off the wedding and instead he and Carrie married instead on September 8, 1997.

questions.text: This wedding was interrupted by the groom's ex-wife coming to take their son.
questions.explanation:
Hal and Emily.

	On the CBS drama, 'As The World Turns', Hal's ex-wife, Barbara, came to get Will, Hal's son and best man, before Hal and Emily's wedding. Hal confronted her and Will stayed.

questions.text: Before this royal couple's wedding, the bride took something to help her rest and her attendants had to pour coffee down her throat and walk her around while getting her ready to walk down the aisle.
questions.explanation:
Richard and Cassie.

	On the CBS drama, 'Guiding Light', Cassie and Prince Richard were married in a regal ceremony at his castle on June 10, 2000.

questions.text: Before this couple found out they were first cousins, they married in her back yard.
questions.explanation:
Billy and Mac.

	On the CBS drama, 'The Young and the Restless', Billy and Mac married before Jill and John could get to the ceremony to stop it. Jill joined the newlywed couple in the honeymoon suite to tell them that they had to get the marriage annulled because her biological mother was Katherine Chancellor, Mac's grandmother.

questions.text: The only way for this mobster to keep from going to jail was to marry the woman who could testify against him; so he did.
questions.explanation:
Sonny and Carly.

	On the ABC drama, 'General Hospital', Sonny married Carly on September 7, 2000 with Jason and Alexis as witnesses. The couple have since then renewed their vows and are madly in love with each other.

questions.text: On this couple's wedding day, they both sang 'Always' to each other during the ceremony.
questions.explanation:
Thorne and Macy.

	On this CBS drama, 'The Bold and the Beautiful', Thorne and Macy were married on September 1, 1995.
